testCases.label: Verify SUM aggregate calculates total payroll
testCases.description: Runs problem1(), which should sum all employee salaries in the employee table. Compares the returned value to the expected total payroll amount.

testCases.label: Verify COUNT aggregate counts all employees with last name 'Smith'
testCases.description: Runs problem2(), which should count how many employees have the last name Smith. Compares the result to the expected count of 2.

testCases.label: Verify MIN aggregate returns the lowest salary
testCases.description: Runs problem3(), which should return the minimum salary in the employee table. Compares the result to the expected minimum of 42500.00.

testCases.label: Verify MAX aggregate returns the highest salary
testCases.description: Runs problem4(), which should return the maximum salary in the employee table. Compares the returned value to the expected maximum of 120000.00.
